attributes.action: Invest in the long term future of our Armed Services, instead of cost cutting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are are personel being sent home early because the base carnt afford the electicity?? Why are the troops in iraq going out with inferrior equipment or lack of it!! If you beleive we should return to the world class forces we once had, but are struggling to keep, then please sign!
